description: Explore the intersection of gaming and NFTs in Guild of Guardians, a new RPG gaining traction with former President Donald Trump's endorsement. Discover the implications for the gaming industry, economic potential of NFTs, and the role of celebrity influence in digital innovation.
keywords: Guild of Guardians, NFTs, Donald Trump, gaming, blockchain, play-to-earn, role-playing game, digital assets, celebrity NFTs, gaming industry
